entry.title: Vite report on Mon, 08 Jan 2024 08:03:37
entry.summary: In recent news, it has been reported that former US President Donald Trump promoted the use of hydroxychloroquine as a treatment for Covid-19. However, this drug is now being linked to approximately 17,000 deaths. The controversial endorsement by Trump has sparked debates and discussions regarding the effectiveness and safety of hydroxychloroquine in combating the virus. In another development, generative AI models have made significant advancements, as they are now capable of creating replicas of trademarked characters. Surprisingly, these models can achieve this feat with prompts as simple as 'videogame Italian'. This technological breakthrough raises concerns about copyright infringement and intellectual property rights. Additionally, Meghan McCain, daughter of the late Senator John McCain, has publicly criticized Trump. This comes after Trump made derogatory remarks about her father, stating that he 'couldn't get his arm up' to torpedo the GOP's Obamacare repeal bill. McCain referred to Trump as a 'huckster' and highlighted that even his own wife refuses to campaign with him. This exchange highlights the ongoing tensions and divisions within the political landscape.
